desc.en: Sendai Subway is an urban rail transit system serving Sendai City, Miyagi Prefecture, Japan, and its first line, the Sendai Metro Namboku Line, opened on July 15, 1987, making Sendai the ninth city in Japan to open a subway system
desc.zh-Hans: 仙台地铁 是服务于日本宫城县仙台市境内的城市轨道交通系统，其首条线路仙台地铁南北线于1987年7月15日开通，使仙台成为日本第9个开通地铁系统的城市
